name: VtM Tophet
description:
Tophet is a text game set in Barcelona.  You play as one of eight Vampire the Masquerade clans.  You´re embraced as a new kindred while a war between princes and a series of sinister disappearances threaten the city and your own survival. 

-Eight different clans to choose. 

-Two different coteries you can join.

-Twelve different endings depending on your choices and relationships.  

-Your own upgradable haven.

-There´s eight different companions but you can only have three each playthrough.  I hope this helps the replayability. 

-You roll the dice.  Having the same attributes and skills can provide different results.

-And more! (At least I hope so).

Notes:  The main quest is completed.  Even if the game has like 40% of the things I wanted to add, all the clans have some different extra content.   Even so the lasombra is the most fleshed out so I recommend playing this one.
